SEARCH
程序包 consoleVersion1

类 Line

java.lang.Object
consoleVersion1.Line
public class Line extends Object
Line class representing a line segment in a 2D space.
作者:
Zichen Liao

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    double
    calcY(double x)
    Calculates the y value of the line, using pre-calculated gradient and offset.
    double
    distanceFrom(double x, double y)
    Finds the shortest distance from point (x, y) to the line.
    double
    distintersection(Line otherLine)
    Calculates the distance from this line to another line.
    boolean
    findintersection(Line otherLine)
    Checks if the line intersects with another line.
    double
    getGradient()
    Returns the calculated gradient of the line, m as in y = mx + c.
    double
    getOffset()
    Returns the calculated offset of the line, c as in y = mx + c.
    double[]
    getXY()
    Returns the value of the xy point.
    boolean
    isOnLine(double[] xyp)
    Checks if point xyp is on the line (i.e., between its start and end coordinates).
    double
    lineLength()
    Calculates the length of the line.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

  • 方法详细资料

    • lineLength

      public double lineLength()
      Calculates the length of the line.
      返回:
      length of the line

    • getXY

      public double[] getXY()
      Returns the value of the xy point.
      返回:
      array of two doubles representing the coordinates

    • getGradient

      public double getGradient()
      Returns the calculated gradient of the line, m as in y = mx + c.
      返回:
      gradient of the line

    • getOffset

      public double getOffset()
      Returns the calculated offset of the line, c as in y = mx + c.
      返回:
      offset of the line

    • calcY

      public double calcY(double x)
      Calculates the y value of the line, using pre-calculated gradient and offset.
      参数:
      x - x-coordinate
      返回:
      y value calculated as mx + c

    • isOnLine

      public boolean isOnLine(double[] xyp)
      Checks if point xyp is on the line (i.e., between its start and end coordinates).
      参数:
      xyp - array where xyp[0] is x and xyp[1] is y
      返回:
      true if the point is on the line, false otherwise

    • findintersection

      public boolean findintersection(Line otherLine)
      Checks if the line intersects with another line. If so, calculates the intersection point in xyp.
      参数:
      otherLine - the other line to check for intersection
      返回:
      true if the lines intersect, false otherwise

    • distintersection

      public double distintersection(Line otherLine)
      Calculates the distance from this line to another line.
      参数:
      otherLine - the other line
      返回:
      distance to the other line

    • distanceFrom

      public double distanceFrom(double x, double y)
      Finds the shortest distance from point (x, y) to the line.
      参数:
      x - x-coordinate of the point
      y - y-coordinate of the point
      返回:
      shortest distance from the point to the line
